reviews.text: Overpriced and not worth it, we were still hungry after. We got a few sushi rolls, rice balls and the cheesesteak knots. The sushi tasted decent but each roll only comes with 6 small pieces. 3 out of the 4 cheesesteak knots were burnt, and they were dry and cold as can be as if they were just sitting out all day and they threw some toppings on it and put it in the oven for the cheese to melt. They definitely weren't fresh garlic knots. Even my 15 year old that loves anything bread or sushi related said it sucked. We expected so much better considering the price and ritzy/snooty area but lesson learned. We'll stick to our usual Omka down the street that never disappoints.

Great pizza!  Brick oven style and very tasty.  Beautiful neighborhood too.

Attached is a picture of their popular pepperoni and sausage.

I don't know who's idea it was to fuse Italian food and Japanese cuisine... but they were RIGHT!
Asian-fusion will be a mainstay for decades it's such a modern yet timeless style of grub ‚è±Ô∏èüçïüç±
It is a small little place so I recommend take-out.
A great choice for when you have conflicting cravings
P.S. The truffle ranch is SUPERB on pizza
Enjoyed the sushi - nice sized pieces of tuna.  Salmon rice balls were tasty.  Pizza was very good as well. Glad we finally tried this place out. We'll definitely be going back.

In our home pizza has been a Sunday lunch tradition for years, but over the past year we decided to change things up with ‚ÄúSushi Sunday.‚Äù We were excited to have a spot that does both really well. The Sushi is really fresh and tastefully assembled. The pizza is evenly portioned with a nice crust thats fully cooked and can handle the weight of any amount of toppings. The family is excited for the new Sunday tradition. Can‚Äôt wait to go back. Great Job.

recentReviews.author: Chris F
recentReviews.text: Overpriced and not worth it, we were still hungry after. We got a few sushi rolls, rice balls and the cheesesteak knots. The sushi tasted decent but each roll only comes with 6 small pieces. 3 out of the 4 cheesesteak knots were burnt, and they were dry and cold as can be as if they were just sitting out all day and they threw some toppings on it and put it in the oven for the cheese to melt. They definitely weren't fresh garlic knots. Even my 15 year old that loves anything bread or sushi related said it sucked. We expected so much better considering the price and ritzy/snooty area but lesson learned. We'll stick to our usual Omka down the street that never disappoints.

negative.text: Overpriced and not worth it, we were still hungry after. We got a few sushi rolls, rice balls and the cheesesteak knots. The sushi tasted decent but each roll only comes with 6 small pieces. 3 out of the 4 cheesesteak knots were burnt, and they were dry and cold as can be as if they were just sitting out all day and they threw some toppings on it and put it in the oven for the cheese to melt. They definitely weren't fresh garlic knots. Even my 15 year old that loves anything bread or sushi related said it sucked. We expected so much better considering the price and ritzy/snooty area but lesson learned. We'll stick to our usual Omka down the street that never disappoints.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.8/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the unique fusion of Italian and Japanese cuisine, making it a modern yet timeless dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The pizza is praised for its evenly portioned crust that can handle any amount of toppings, appealing to pizza lovers who appreciate quality and craftsmanship. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The sushi is described as really fresh and tastefully assembled, which appeals to sushi aficionados seeking quality and freshness. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews about food quality and freshness (e.g., burnt cheesesteak knots, small sushi rolls) - review management can address this concern
Perception of being overpriced and not worth the cost - social media marketing can improve this area
Competition with nearby restaurants (e.g., Omka) - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
